title: Take Special Care - Wiley, Ariza
description: Before the Dallas shootings, Cari Champion and Marcellus Wiley weighed in on the recent police shootings of Alton Sterling and Philando Castile. Plus, she talked to Trevor Ariza about NBA free agency & more.
itunes:title: Take Special Care - Wiley, Ariza
